name: atom-ide-datatip
description: A replacement for the Data Tooltip provider that was originally part of the Atom IDE package from Facebook.

showDataTipOnCursorMove.title: Flag denotes if the data tip should be shown automatically
showDataTipOnCursorMove.description: If set to true, the data tip is shown as soon as you move your cursor around. Otherwise you will have to activate it via keypress.
